Text.val: -- If V.FCMH_NO06 > V.FCMH_NO08 then set V.DAYS = V.DAYS06
-- If V.FCMH_NO06 < V.FCMH_NO08 then set V.DAYS = V.DAYS08
-- Only if V.DAYS > 0 then set DEBC_NETDAYS = V.DAYS

SQL_STMT_U.val: select FM06_NO, FM06_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS from :1/FCBU, :1/FM06, :1/FCMH where FCBU_MEMBER_NO_EF = ':2' and FCBU_MEMBER_NO_IF=':3' and FCBU_BUYER_DEBH_NO = :4 and Upper(FCBU_SELLER_NO) = Upper(':5') and FM06_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS > 0 and Upper(FM06_BUYER_NO) = Upper(FCBU_BUYER_NO) and FCMH_NO = FM06_NO and Upper(FCMH_SELLER_NO) = Upper(FCBU_SELLER_NO) order by FM06_NO desc

select FM08_NO, FM08_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS from :1/FCBU, :1/FM08, :1/FCMH where FCBU_MEMBER_NO_EF = ':2' and FCBU_MEMBER_NO_IF=':3' and FCBU_BUYER_DEBH_NO = :4 and Upper(FCBU_SELLER_NO) = Upper(':5') and FM08_LONGCREDITPERIODDAYS > 0 and Upper(FM08_BUYER_NO) = Upper(FCBU_BUYER_NO) and FCMH_NO = FM08_NO and Upper(FCMH_SELLER_NO) = Upper(FCBU_SELLER_NO) order by FM08_NO desc
